solution_line_template: This is a total of {correct_neighbors} neighbors * {cookies_per_neighbor} cookies = <<{correct_neighbors}*{cookies_per_neighbor}={correct_neighbors_cookies}>>{correct_neighbors_cookies} cookies taken by the first 13 neighbors.

There were only {cookies_left} cookies left, so that means the first 13 neighbors and Sarah took a total of {total_cookies} – {cookies_left} = <<{total_cookies}-{cookies_left}={cookies_taken_by_14}>>{cookies_taken_by_14} cookies.
So Sarah must have taken {cookies_taken_by_14} – {correct_neighbors_cookies} = <<{cookies_taken_by_14}-{correct_neighbors_cookies}={sarah_cookies}>>{sarah_cookies} cookies.
